import React, { Component } from 'react'; class BookAdd extends Component { state = { bookName:'', author:'', year:'' } changeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(this.state) } render() { const { bookName, author, year } = this.state return (
BookName Author Year
{this.state.bookName}
); } } export default BookAdd;
